org.apache.felix.ipojo

Class ConfigurationTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.ConfigurationTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationListener

    public class ConfigurationTracker
extends Object
implements ConfigurationListener
    An object tracking configuration from the configuration admin. It delegates to the underlying factories or component instance the action.

    This class implements a Configuration Listener, so events are received asynchronously.
